title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Life size cartoon of  partial Hebrew text in three lines showing partial citrus fruit "etrog" at left edge.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.Brush and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-73-c.
